title: Quarkus 2.5.4.Final released - Maintenance release
content: We just released Quarkus 2.5.4.Final, a maintenance release for our 2.5 release train containing bugfixes and documentation improvements. It is a safe upgrade for anyone already using 2.5. If you are not using 2.5 already, please refer to the 2.5 migration guide. Main changes Jackson 2.12.6 We upgraded to Jackson...
